blue.lapis.common.economy.formatter

Class PrefixBalanceFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • blue.lapis.common.economy.formatter.AbstractBalanceFormatter
      • blue.lapis.common.economy.formatter.PrefixBalanceFormatter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BalanceFormatter

    public class PrefixBalanceFormatter
extends AbstractBalanceFormatter
    Formats currency by simply prepending a currency symbol to a formatted number.

    • Method Detail

      • format

        Description copied from interface: BalanceFormatter
        Converts a machine-readable currency into a human-readable String which expresses its quantity and units
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount of currency to render
        Returns:
        A formatted String expressing the currency's quantity and units.
